professional_summary: Database Administrator with expertise in Oracle and PostgreSQL databases, experienced in managing large-scale database systems, ensuring high performance, availability, and security.

key_responsibilities: Installed
configured and maintained Oracle Databases 11g/10g/9i on Real Application Cluster (RAC) with ASM and without ASM.
Provided support on DB service outage calls due to infrastructure slowness or failures
performing end-to-end diagnostics and providing immediate fixes following RCA.
Monitored SQL plan changes
analyzed SQLHC and SQLT reports
and implemented best practices for query stability using SQL Profiles and SQL plan baselines.
